name: Focused Phantom
text: Your close bond with your phantom helps you to focus your concentration.
benefit: While you are adjacent to your phantom or your phantom is within your consciousness, you receive a +4 bonus on concentration checks.
text_zh: 你与魅影的紧密联结能帮助你集中精神。
prerequisites_zh: 魅影加护（Spiritual Interference）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你与你的魅影（phantom）相邻，或者你的魅影附身于你的意识之中时，你会在专注检定中获得+4加值。
